item.title: Adding `.htaccess` to Apache Container `/tmp` Directory
item.description: For some time now we’ve had a problem lurking in Digital.Grinnell, when large files are opened for viewing or download one of the DG services makes a temporary copy of the file in the Apache container’s /tmp directory. Locally, and in staging I’ve debugged the code that is responsible for removing the temporary file once the operation is complete. Running locally or in staging the process does its job, the temporary files get deleted soon after creation, but this never happens in production.
